hero.headline: Board of Directors
hero.subheadline: Leadership guiding the Murray Area Chamber of Commerce

boardSection.title: Board Members
boardSection.description: Our volunteer board provides strategic direction and governance.

boardMembers.name: Brett Lechtenberg
boardMembers.title: Chair of the Board
boardMembers.subtitle: Education Chair
boardMembers.bio: Brett leads the Chamber board and chairs the Education Committee, driving initiatives to support Murray businesses.

boardMembers.name: Kristen Latimer
boardMembers.title: Vice Chair of the Board
boardMembers.subtitle: Marketing Chair
boardMembers.bio: Kristen serves as Vice Chair and leads marketing initiatives to promote Chamber members and programs.

boardMembers.name: Amber Miller
boardMembers.title: Treasurer
boardMembers.bio: Amber oversees Chamber finances, ensuring responsible stewardship of member resources.

boardMembers.name: Elvon Farrell
boardMembers.title: Chair of Bylaws
boardMembers.subtitle: Parliamentarian
boardMembers.bio: Elvon leads the Bylaws Committee and serves as Parliamentarian for board proceedings.

boardMembers.name: Lenny Leslie
boardMembers.title: Advisor to the Board
boardMembers.bio: Lenny provides strategic guidance and institutional knowledge as Advisor to the Board.

boardMembers.name: Dorie Olds
boardMembers.title: Secretary
boardMembers.subtitle: Women in Business; Ribbon Cutting Committee
boardMembers.bio: Dorie serves as Secretary and leads both the Women in Business and Ribbon Cutting Committees.

staffSection.title: Chamber Staff
staffSection.description: Our dedicated team works daily to serve our members.

staff.name: Kathy White
staff.title: President & CEO
staff.subtitle: Ambassador Chair
staff.bio: Kathy leads the Murray Area Chamber of Commerce and chairs the Ambassador program, driving member engagement and community growth.

staff.name: Page
staff.title: Executive Assistant
staff.bio: Page provides essential administrative support to ensure smooth Chamber operations and member services.

cta.headline: Interested in Serving?
cta.description: Board positions are filled through nominations. Contact us to learn about opportunities to serve on the board or join a committee.
